item.description:
I am pleased to announce the first Karaoke Sunday event for our meetup group.

Yes, it is Father's Day. Feel free to bring your Dad along! This is a non-exclusive event which means that we will be mixing in with the venue's regular patrons. The good news: No fee for attending. The bad news: longer waits for your turn at the microphone.

We can sit together as a group or we can mingle with everybody else. In fact, you don't need to sign up for this meetup; you can just show up. However, I am hoping that there will be enough interest eventually to arrange a regular exclusive Karaoke event similar to the monthly meetup at The Courtside. So, it will help a lot to get a rough head count if you do sign up for this.

I hope to see many of you there!

Randall.

Â
item.name: Karaoke Sunday June 17th (Non-exclusive event)
